title: Ember
description: INKED PROTECTOR REUNITES WITH A SINGLE MOTHER.Rocco Caldo is tall, dark, and handsome, but not interested in love. Loyal to a fault, he can’t turn away an old friend in need or a beautiful woman on the run…especially when they have unfinished business.Rebel Bishop is a single mom, looking for shelter, not a handout. But when her path crosses with an old flame, they uncover an ember of passion that’s been smoldering inside them both for over a decade.Can they move beyond their tragic pasts, allowing the flame to burn bright into their future?Ember is the seventh full-length standalone novel in the Men of Inked® Heatwave series by USA Today bestselling author Chelle Bliss®.Men of Inked®: Heatwave Series:Book 1 - FlameBook 2 - BurnBook 3 - WildfireBook 4 - BlazeBook 5 - IgniteBook 6 - SparkBook 7 - EmberBook 8 - Singe
author: Chelle Bliss
